queries.name: query_histogram
queries.sql: select histogram(_timestamp, '10 second') AS zo_sql_key, count(*) AS zo_sql_num from default GROUP BY zo_sql_key ORDER BY zo_sql_key

queries.name: query_count
queries.sql: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as _time, service_name, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM "default" GROUP BY _time, service_name

queries.name: query_distinct
queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT kubernetes_container_name, _timestamp FROM "e2e_automate" ORDER BY _timestamp

queries.name: query_having
queries.sql: SELECT histogram(_timestamp,'1 minutes') as eventtime1, COUNT(_timestamp) as totallogcount FROM "default" GROUP BY eventtime1 Having totallogcount > 100 ORDER BY eventtime1 DESC

queries.name: query_countcase
queries.sql: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minutes') as eventtime1, COUNT(_timestamp) as totallogcount, COUNT(CASE WHEN body = 'error' THEN 1 END) as errorlogcount, (COUNT(CASE WHEN body = 'error' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100.0) as errorrate FROM 'default' GROUP BY eventtime1 ORDER BY eventtime1 DESC

queries.name: query_strmatchignorecase
queries.sql: Select histogram(_timestamp) as x_axis_1, count(k8s_pod_uid) as y_axis_1 from "default" where str_match_ignore_case(k8s_namespace_name, 'monitor') group by x_axis_1

queries.name: query_likebreakdown
queries.sql: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1", k8s_namespace_name as "breakdown_1" FROM "default" WHERE k8s_container_name LIKE '%a%' GROUP BY x_axis_1, breakdown_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 DESC

queries.name: query_in
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM "default" WHERE k8s_container_name IN ('controller', 'ziox') ORDER BY _timestamp DESC

queries.name: query_strmatch
queries.sql: Select histogram(_timestamp) as x_axis_1, count(k8s_pod_uid) as y_axis_1 from "default" where str_match(k8s_namespace_name, 'monitor') group by x_axis_1

queries.name: query_percentile
queries.sql: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '30 seconds') as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(arrow_cast(k8s_container_restart_count,'Int64'), 0.99) as "y_axis_1" FROM "default" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
